data.title: Barcelona legend Samuel Eto’o congratulates his boyhood club Real Madrid after dramatic win against Man City
data.description: Legendary Barcelona striker Samuel Eto’o has congratulated his boyhood club Real Madrid after coming from behind to beat Manchester City to a place in the 2021/22 Champions League final. Samuel Eto’o joined Real Madrid at the age of 16 and was a part of the 1999/2000 UEFA Champions League winning squad before he was loaned …The post Barcelona legend Samuel Eto’o congratulates his boyhood club Real Madrid after dramatic win against Man City appeared first on Nigeria sports news, transfers & gossips.
